org.ocast.sdk.common.utils

Class XMLElement

  • org.ocast.sdk.common.utils.XMLElement

    This class represents an XML element.

      • XMLElement

        public XMLElement(@NotNull
                  java.lang.String name,
                  @NotNull
                  java.lang.String value,
                  @NotNull
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes,
                  @NotNull
                  java.util.List<org.ocast.sdk.common.utils.XMLElement> children)

        Creates an instance of class XMLElement.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the XML element.
        value - The value of the XML element.
        attributes - The attributes associated with the XML element. The value of each attribute is indexed by its name.
        children - The children for this XML element.
